thread.title: Big Q BBQ Redefines Fast Food for Barbecue Fans

author: cbs8
title: Big Q BBQ Redefines Fast Food for Barbecue Fans
text:
New Restaurant Emerges as High Quality Choice in Philadelphia area
Levittown, PA (PRWEB) October 26, 2015
Barbecue lovers can forget everything they ever knew about one of their favorite meals, if Big Q BBQ gets their way.
The greater Philadelphia area restaurant is redefining the way fast food is done with a “fast barbecue” experience for people who want a high quality meal.
In the 2 months since Big Q BBQ ( http://www.bigqbbq.com ) has been open, they’ve quickly established themselves as a leader in barbecue offering a new way of service.
Big Q BBQ owner Drew Abruzzese says it’s all about caring for people who care about the best.
“We wanted to serve the same quality food that’s made at home from scratch, but we wanted to serve it for the masses,” Abruzzese said. “People shouldn’t have to sacrifice a good barbecue meal because they’re too busy.”
Abruzzese isn’t a stranger to success, he honed his barbecue craft through his other successful local restaurant ventures, The Pineville Tavern and The Wrightstown Farmers Market.
Great food for busy people
Big Q BBQ opened at the end of July and has enjoyed an overwhelming response.
Abruzzese’s restaurant is built on a unique principle of catering to people who have trouble fitting quality food into their busy lives.
The Big Q BBQ difference is a simple experience, quick service, with the highest quality. Including:
 Fast-service mentality: reliable drive through or pick-up orders Quality meats: the finest, freshest food from local suppliers Time-honored recipes: from a chef who’s shared the stage with Guy Fieri
The restaurant’s menu includes all the standard favorites, including brisket, pulled chicken, pulled pork sandwiches, fish sandwiches and family platters.
About Big Q BBQ
Big Q BBQ is a Levittown, PA based restaurant devoted to creating a high-quality barbecue experience in a fast-service way that people will love and appreciate.
Owner and chef Drew Abruzzese brings to the plate years of barbecue experience, and recipes that have been developed over time. Abruzzese also brings to the table years of success from his previous experience running the successful Pineville Tav-ern in Buckingham.
Big Q BBQ offers a simple menu of high-quality barbecue staples, including brisket sandwiches, St. Louis ribs and fried chicken buckets, as well as pulled chicken and pork.
Website: bigqbbq.com ( http://www.bigqbbq.com/ )
